title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
review: A psychological thriller that keeps you guessing till the end.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
review: Atomic Habits shows how small changes lead to big results. James Clear explains the science behind habit formation and how to build better habits without relying on motivation. The book is filled with actionable strategies and real-life examples. It's easy to understand, practical, and motivating. Anyone trying to improve their routine or break bad habits will find this book incredibly helpful.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
review: A powerful memoir of a woman breaking free from a strict upbringing.

author: George Orwell
review: A chilling dystopian novel that feels eerily relevant today.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
review: A simple yet profound story about following your dreams.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
review: An honest guide to living a better life by caring less.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
review: An inspiring memoir of resilience, ambition, and grace.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
review: Explores the history of humans from evolution to modern times.

title: It Ends with Us
author: Colleen Hoover
review: An emotional romance novel that deals with difficult themes.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
review: A magical story about choices and the paths not taken.

title: The Four Agreements
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
review: Offers simple wisdom for living with freedom and happiness.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
review: Teaches the mindset difference between wealth and struggle.

title: Can't Hurt Me
author: David Goggins
review: A brutally honest story of pushing past mental and physical limits.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
review: Focuses on the behavior side of personal finance and wealth.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
review: An epic science fiction saga filled with politics and philosophy.
